00022 /**
00023  * @file   DM.h
00024  * @author Xiaojun Di
00025  * @date   March 8 2006
00026  * 
00027  * DRAFT: wraps the DM algorithmics for genotyping under SDK
00028  * 
00029  */
00030 
00031 #ifndef __DM_H__
00032 #define __DM_H__
00033 
00034 //
00035 #include <algorithm>
00036 #include <cmath>
00037 #include <functional>
00038 #include <limits>
00039 #include <vector>
00040 
00041 /// infinity of floats
00042 #define FLOATINFINITY   numeric_limits<float>::max()
00043 /// number of cells per quartets
00044 #define NUMCELLS                4
00045 /// log of 2 pi
00046 #define LOG2PI                  log(6.283185)   
00047 
00048 /**
00049 * An object to probe quartet, each quartet contains 4 cells
00050 * each cell contains intensity, variance and number of pixels, store variance instead of stdev
00051 */
00052 class CQuartet
00053 {
00054 public:
00055   
00056   /// alleles
00057   typedef enum
00058     {
00059       A_Allele,
00060       B_Allele
00061     } Allele;
00062   
00063   /// match types
00064   typedef enum
00065     {
00066       PM,
00067       MM
00068     } MatchType;
00069   
00070   /// four cells in the order of PM_A, MM_A, PM_B and MM_B
00071   /// number of pixels per cell
00072   int pixels[NUMCELLS];
00073   /// intensities of each cell of the quartet
00074   float intensity[NUMCELLS];
00075   /// variances of each cell of the quartet
00076   float variance[NUMCELLS];
00077   
00078   /**
00079   * @brief get the probe quartet given the allele type and match type
00080   * @param allele - allele type: A or B
00081   * @param matchtype - the match type: perfect or mis
00082   * @return the probe index
00083   */
00084   int GetIndex(const int& allele, const int& matchtype);
00085   
00086   /**
00087   * @brief default constructor
00088   */
00089   CQuartet();
00090   
00091   /**
00092   * @brief set intensity for allele type=allele and match type = matchtype
00093   * @param allele - allele type: A or B
00094   * @param matchtype - the match type: perfect or mis
00095   * @param val - the value to be set
00096   * @return void
00097   */
00098   inline void SetIntensity(const int& allele, const int& matchtype, const float& val)
00099   {
00100     intensity[GetIndex(allele,matchtype)] = val;
00101   }
00102   
00103   /**
00104   * @brief set variance for allele type=allele and match type = matchtype
00105   * @param allele - allele type: A or B
00106   * @param matchtype - the match type: perfect or mis
00107   * @param val - the value to be set
00108   * @return void
00109   */  
00110   inline void SetVariance(const int& allele, const int& matchtype, const float& val)
00111   {
00112     variance[GetIndex(allele,matchtype)] = val;
00113   }
00114   
00115   /**
00116   * @brief set number of pixels for allele type=allele and match type = matchtype
00117   * @param allele - allele type: A or B
00118   * @param matchtype - the match type: perfect or mis
00119   * @param val - the value to be set
00120   * @return void
00121   */  
00122   inline void SetPixels(const int& allele, const int& matchtype, const int& val)
00123   {
00124     pixels[GetIndex(allele,matchtype)] = val;
00125   }
00126 };
00127 
00128 /**
00129 * the global function to invoke DM algorithm
00130 * @param vquartets - a vector of quartets containing not just the intensities but also the variances and pixels
00131 * @param hetMult - het multiplier, hetMult is used to adjust the likelihood of AB by multiplying a constant factor, 
00132 * which is equivalent to adding a constant (hetMult) to its loglikelihood, default to 0 or no adjustment is requested
00133 *
00134 * @param results -- pair of p-value and associated genotype call to be returned
00135 * @return true if no error, false otherwise
00136 */
00137 bool CallDM(const std::vector<CQuartet> &vquartets, std::pair<float,int>& results, const float& hetMult = 0);
00138 
00139 #endif // __DM_H__
